jd: Hi Professionals, This is Arun from GAC solutions Inc. I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent requirement your prompt response is appreciated Technical Project Manager New York, NY - Onsite Contract H1B Consultants Only Desired Skills/Years of Experience:• Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification• Hands on Java Platform Qualifications:• Superior client/partner consultative skills and experience in managing large-scale projects• Superior communication and presentation skills• Excellent leadership and relationship management skills and experience• Planning and strategic – have developed programs that can accomplish a business's larger goal• Risk management - the ability to recognize, measure, and mitigate the many risks that come• KPIs - Be able to define metrics to track the quality, maintainability, and ways to improve metrics• Experience working with large, Fortune 500-class companies• Strong Technical Aptitude• 10+ years of technical IBM Mainframe experience working on project/program management that aligns with the responsibilities of the position• 3-5 years working in mainframe modernization to the cloud• 2-5 Years working with AWS or Azure cloud environments• Solid knowledge of legacy systems, programs, software, and environments• Understanding and have worked with programming languages such as Cobol, Java, C#, and others• Ability to assess and analyze the complexity of the technical design and guide the teams• Experience in project management methodologies, preferably with a PMP/Agile/Waterfall• Be able to pass background, credit, and drug tests based on Astadia, client, and partner policies and standards Responsibilities:• Lead and direct the migration project team as well as consulting and supporting the partner and client teams• Lead and manage migrations from the mainframe to AWS, Azure, GCP, and Oracle• Present information and demonstrate knowledge about IBM mainframe environments including COBOL, Assembler, copybooks, JCL, CICS, Db2, and IMS• Deliver large scale 2+ year engagements with revenue exceeding $10M• Build and nurture team, client, and partner relationships• Expertly communicate and present information to Astadia, clients, and partners• Follow and apply project methodology standards including Agile, Waterfall, and hybrid of• Use Azure DevOps and similar tools for managing large project Best Regards, Arun K Senior IT Recruiter
